nodes.bodyText: Pls remove this checking since it is already verified by org.prebid.server.validation.RequestValidator so no need to do it in each bidder.

Seems we need to rename method name to impExtToImps(..).
We don't need to pass whole BidRequest object as method argument here since we use only request.getImp().
Since this method is called, no reason to check banner != null

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,25 @@
+adapters:
+  lunamedia:
+    enabled: false
+    endpoint: http://api.lunamedia.io/xp/get?pubid=
+    pbs-enforces-gdpr: true
+    pbs-enforces-ccpa: true
+    modifying-vast-xml-allowed: true
+    deprecated-names:
+    aliases:
+    meta-info:
+      maintainer-email: josh@lunamedia.io
+      app-media-types:
+        - banner
+        - video
+      site-media-types:
+        - banner
+        - video
+      supported-vendors:
+      vendor-id: 0
+    usersync:
+      url: https://api.lunamedia.io/xp/user-sync?redirect=
+      redirect-url: /setuid?bidder=lunamedia&gdpr={{gdpr}}&gdpr_consent={{gdpr_consent}}&uid=$UID

nodes.bodyText: It not strongly required to name the field camel case,  pubid if fine. So no annotation will be needed.
Fix bidder name or remove the comment.
We don't need currency anymore here.
PLs change the type to iframe according to Go config.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,25 @@
+adapters:
+  lunamedia:
+    enabled: false
+    endpoint: http://api.lunamedia.io/xp/get?pubid=
+    pbs-enforces-gdpr: true
+    pbs-enforces-ccpa: true
+    modifying-vast-xml-allowed: true
+    deprecated-names:
+    aliases:
+    meta-info:
+      maintainer-email: josh@lunamedia.io
+      app-media-types:
+        - banner
+        - video
+      site-media-types:
+        - banner
+        - video
+      supported-vendors:
+      vendor-id: 0
+    usersync:
+      url: https://api.lunamedia.io/xp/user-sync?redirect=
+      redirect-url: /setuid?bidder=lunamedia&gdpr={{gdpr}}&gdpr_consent={{gdpr_consent}}&uid=$UID
+      cookie-family-name: lunamedia
+      type: redirect
